data.eml:eml: Two new species of Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 from Spain (Coleoptera: Buprestidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arnáiz-Ruiz, Lucía, Bercedo-Páramo, Pablo (2003): Two new species of Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 from Spain (Coleoptera: Buprestidae). Zootaxa 267: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157110
